### Block 2: Silver Badge ğŸ¥ˆ

### Block 4: Iron Badge âš™ï¸

- [ ] No secrets committed to version control

**Trainer Notes**:

---

### Block 5: Steel Badge ğŸ›¡ï¸

- [ ] Dockerfile uses multi-stage build

- [ ] Kustomize overlays work for dev/qa/prod
- [ ] Deployment succeeds to kind cluster

- [ ] Docker image size is optimized
- [ ] K8s resources have proper labels and annotations
